connection.title: Connection
connection.activeNetworkTitle: How to access Pegasus FIELD via browser
connection.howToConnect: How to connect your own device

help.title: Connecting a device
help.wlanStep1: Turn ON the hotspot of the WLAN device (tablet/phone/router).
help.wlanStep2: From the PCU tap the Connect Page and connect to the WLAN hotspot
help.wlanStep3: If the WLAN device is a tablet, open Pegasus FIELD by scanning the QR Code or by typing the IP address (displayed on the PCU screen) in the address bar of the browser.
help.wlanStep4: If the WLAN device is a phone or a router, connect a tablet to the WLAN hotspot and follow the instructions of point 3.
help.lanStep1: Connect the PCU to your laptop or tablet through a LAN cable.
help.lanStep2: Set your device to the same ethernet subnet (subnet IP: 192.168.1.x, subnet mask: 255.255.255.0)
help.lanStep3: Do not use the following IP for your device: 192.168.1.5.
help.lanStep4: Open the internet browser on your device.
help.lanStep5: Open Pegasus FIELD by typing the IP Address (displayed on the PCU screen) in the address bar of the browser

check_browser.title: Please, check the browser.
check_browser.ios:
The browser you are using is not the recommended one from Leica Pegasus FIELD.
Leica Pegasus FIELD works with the latest version of Safari.
check_browser.android:
The browser you are using is not the recommended one for Leica Pegasus FIELD.
Leica Pegasus FIELD works with the latest version of Google Chrome.
check_browser.unknown:
The browser you are using is not the recommended one for Leica Pegasus FIELD.
Leica Pegasus FIELD works with the latest version of Google Chrome.
check_browser.windows:
The browser you are using is not the recommended one for Leica Pegasus FIELD.
Leica Pegasus FIELD works with the latest version of Microsoft Edge.

menu.title: Profile details
menu.rebootDisabled: Battery charge is too low to reboot.

processingShutdown.title: Do you really want to shut down the system?
processingShutdown.text: Some Jobs are currently in processing. If you switch OFF the system, the processing will stop. The processing can be manually reactivated after restarting the system.

processingReboot.title: Do you really want to reboot the system?
processingReboot.text: Some Jobs are currently in processing. If you reboot the system, the processing will stop. The processing can be manually reactivated after reboot.

header.systemIsOff: PCU and Sensor Unit are shutting down...

form.qrcodeReader: Scan the QR code on the PCU screen.
form.qrcodeLegacy: The camera is not responding. Click on the button to load a picture.

forgot.title: Forgot password
forgot.please_contact: Please contact the support via the following e-mail.
forgot.credentials: Tap “Connect” on the home screen of the PCU. The credentials will be displayed in the connection section.

project_browser.subtitle: My Projects
project_browser.click_to_create: Click + to create a new Project
project_browser.delete_text:
Do you really want to delete this Project?
All the content of this Project will be removed from the disk.

no_disks.title: Unable to create new Projects
no_disks.text: Please plug in at least one HD and check the available disks in the top bar.

job_browser.subtitle: My Jobs
job_browser.admin_job: This Job type requires administrator privileges.
job_browser.click_to_create: Click + to create a new Job
job_browser.delete_text:
Do you really want to delete this Job?
All the content of this Job will be removed from the disk.
job_browser.acquired_job_text: You cannot start the same Job again, but you can perform processing and further actions.
job_browser.new_jobtype_text: Specify the basic Job type (Road, Rail, or Marine). Then, enter a name for the new Job type.
job_browser.save_jobtype_text: Save the current Job settings in a new Job type for future uses?
job_browser.save_jobtype_name_required: Enter a name for the new Job type.
job_browser.save_jobtype_min: The name must be at least 3 characters long.
job_browser.delete_jobtype_text: Are you sure you want to delete the Job type '{{profile}}'? The Job settings will not be affected.'
job_browser.processed_office_tooltip: Trajectory and point cloud processing successfully completed.
job_browser.not_processed_office_tooltip: Trajectory and point cloud processing pending.

ready.title: Job report

image_blur.title: Not compliant with the GDPR
image_blur.text: The User is obliged to comply with all laws, regulations and regulatory directives while using the Pegasus, also regarding data protection and privacy laws. For this purpose, Hexagon (hereinafter referred to as “We”) have activated an anonymisation function by default during the use of the Pegasus service. The User may deactivate this function on his own responsibility, but We reserve the right to automatically reactivate the anonymisation function after a certain period, upon installation of updates or upgrades, and after any maintenance, without having any obligation to inform the User about the activation. The User is obliged to always verify the activation / deactivation of the anonymisation function before starting to use the Pegasus service.
image_blur.checkbox: Do not show this warning for 30 days.

acquisition.title: Data capture
acquisition.deactivate_disclaimer: Deactivating the system during the alignment phase could cause loss of accuracy of the final trajectory data.
acquisition.pointcloud_error: Error on loading the point cloud.

deactivated_camera.title: Camera disconnected
deactivated_camera.text_default: Connection to a camera was lost after the system was turned ON.
deactivated_camera.text_activating: Connection to a camera was lost after the system was turned ON. Do you want to activate the system anyway?
deactivated_camera.text_active: Connection to a camera was lost after the system was turned ON. Reconnect the camera before starting the data capture.
deactivated_camera.text_recording: Connection to a camera was lost after the system was turned ON. Stop the data capture and reconnect the camera.

reactivated_camera.title: Camera reconnected
reactivated_camera.text_some: One of the disconnected cameras has been reconnected. Other cameras are still disconnected.
reactivated_camera.text_all: A camera has been reconnected. Stop and restart the data capture to use the camera.
reactivated_camera.text_resume: A camera has been reconnected. Do you want to resume the data capture?

tts.title: Activating audio messages...
tts.text: Click to unlock the audio messages for the data capture.

skip_alert.title: Stop alignment
skip_alert.text: Skipping the initial alignment could compromise the final accuracy of the Job. Do you want to continue?
skip_alert.text_final: Skipping the final alignment could compromise the final accuracy of the Job. Do you want to continue?

out_of_range.title: Out of range for alignment
out_of_range.text: The alignment should start in a range of 100 m from the planned point. Click on Proceed to proceed anyway.

final_confirm.title: Final alignment
final_confirm.text: Do you want to start the final alignment?

abort.title: Turn OFF auto-capture
abort.text: Are you sure you want to turn OFF autonomous data capture? This can be turned ON again later in this Job.

camera.disabled: Camera is OFF for this Track

dialog.title: RTK settings
dialog.mountpoints_failure: A problem occurred while loading the mounting points.

form.title: Add new server
form.exists: A server with the same name already exists.

delete_dialog.title: Delete server
delete_dialog.text:
Are you sure you want to delete this server?
Note: This cannot be undone.

quality.title: Estimated quality
quality.satellite: Number of available satellites per 30 minutes interval

dmi_none.title: DMI
dmi_none.text: The distance measurement instrument (DMI) measures the travelled distance. The mechanical DMI counts the number of wheel revolutions per second while the optical DMI measures the covered distance with an optical sensor.

coordinate_system.title: Coordinate system
coordinate_system.text: The coordinate system affects the results in Finalise & Export. By selecting Automatic the coordinate system is calculated at the end of the first acquisition. It is possible to manually import a custom coordinate system. The coordinate system can be changed until the first processing is completed succesfully.

firmwareUpdate.footer: You can only update licence and firmware from the display of the Pegasus Controller Unit.
firmwareUpdate.versionAvailable: Version {{ updateAvailableVersion }} detected on your device.
firmwareUpdate.noInstallerDetected: No valid installer detected in your storage device.
firmwareUpdate.updateGuidelines: Updates installation guidelines (from your storage device)
firmwareUpdate.logMyWorld: Log into myWorld and download a Pegasus FIELD installer.
firmwareUpdate.savePEF: Save Pegasus FIELD in the root folder of your storage device.
firmwareUpdate.plugDevice: Plug your storage device into a USB port of the PCU.
firmwareUpdate.clickUpdateNow: Then click Update now button above or on the PCU Licence & software menu.
firmwareUpdate.downloadAgain: A required component is missing or corrupted. Redownload Pegasus FIELD Software from myWorld.
firmwareUpdate.notUnplugStorage: Please do not unplug your storage device.

dialog.headline1: Please review the licence terms before installing the software, which will apply to all updates performed during this session.
dialog.headline3: After the first reboot this page will not be available. You can check the installation progress directly on the PCU screen. At the end of the installation a reboot is required. Do you want to proceed?

checkUpdate.versionAvailable: Version {{ updateAvailableVersion }} is now available on myWorld.
checkUpdate.licenseExpired: CCP licence is expired. Renew it to update Pegasus FIELD.

myWorld.title: To check the release notes and download the latest installer:

checkUpdate.error: Unable to retrieve information from myWorld

helpSupport.motivation: What can we help you with?
helpSupport.footer: By clicking 'Send' you will share all the information related to the selected option with the Leica Support.

submit.optimise_popup: The estimate is based on the current Track order. Refining the Track order could improve the estimate. Note: Track order refinement is not reversible.

notracks.title: Add at least one Track
notracks.message: You cannot start estimating a plan without a Track.

initialAlignmentPoint.title: Define location for initial alignment
initialAlignmentPoint.message: You cannot start estimating a plan without defining a position for the initial alignment phase.
initialAlignmentPoint.button: Define the location for the initial alignment.

finalAlignmentPoint.title: Define location for final alignment.
finalAlignmentPoint.message: The estimation does not account for the location of the final alignment. Final values may differ.

unsavedPlan.title: Unsaved Job plan
unsavedPlan.message: Are you sure you want to exit without saving the plan? You will lose all the changes made.

delete_confirm.text: Are you sure you want to delete {{pathName}}?
delete_confirm.text_polygon: Are you sure you want to delete {{pathName}} and its {{tracks}} Tracks?
delete_confirm.title: Delete {{type}}

user_tips.starting_point_empty_polygon: Draw a new Track or a new polygon by picking points on the map.
user_tips.starting_point_empty: Draw a new Track by picking points on the map.
user_tips.initial_point: Pick a point into the map to set the position for the initial alignment.
user_tips.final_point: Pick a point into the map to set the position for the final alignment.
user_tips.starting_point_polygon: Select a Track or polygon by picking it in the map (or select the item from the sidebar).
user_tips.starting_point: Select a Track by picking it in the map (or select the item from the sidebar).
user_tips.new_track_start: Pick a position on the map to start a new Track.
user_tips.new_track: Pick positions on the map to add additional points, double tap to end the Track.
user_tips.new_polygon_start: Pick a position on the map to start a new polygon.
user_tips.new_polygon: Pick positions on the map to add additional points, double tap to close the polygon.
user_tips.toolbar_delete_polygon: Pick a Track or polygon on the map to delete.
user_tips.toolbar_delete: Pick a Track on the map to delete.
user_tips.toolbar_delete_internal: Pick a Track on the map to delete.
user_tips.toolbar_cut: Pick a point on a Track to split the Track in that position.
user_tips.toolbar_move: Pick, hold and drag a point to move it within the map. It creates a new point if none exist.
user_tips.use_tools: Use the toolbar to access the editing tools.

errors.nearest_point: HERE Navigation map server is not responding. Please, check the internet connection.
errors.arcs: HERE Navigation map server is not responding. Please, check the internet connection.
errors.estimate_failed: Processing failed: an Internet connection is required for Job estimation.
errors.path: Error while calculating the requested path.

DS-039.title: Critical disk space
DS-039.text: According to your plan, the Job will occupy more than 80% of the available disk space.
DS-039.buttonOk: Move Job to a new disk

DS-038.title: Disk space exceeded
DS-038.textSingle: The estimated Job size might exceed the available disk capacity. Free-up space on the assigned disk. Alternatively, add a new disk on which to move the Job without losing any data.
DS-038.textMultiple: The estimated Job size might exceed the available disk capacity. Free-up space on the assigned disk or move the Job to a new disk without losing any data.
DS-038.buttonOk: Move Job to a new disk

job_moved.title: Job moved
job_moved.text: You can find the new Job on disk {{disk}} as {{job}} in Project {{project}}.

errors.2nd_antenna_not_configured: Configure the second antenna before proceeding.
errors.2nd_antenna_no_distance: Specify the distance between the antenna and the panoramic camera. Only numbers are allowed.
errors.2nd_antenna_min_distance: The second antenna should be placed at a minimum distance of {{distance}} from the panoramic camera.
errors.2nd_antenna_no_manual: Enter the lever arm x, y, z values. Only numbers are allowed.
errors.2nd_antenna_invalid: The second antenna configuration is invalid. Please, check the values.

code.ECONNABORTED: Communication with the system is slow. Please, check the network connections or wait for the system to become responsive.
code.BTU-003: Low battery: The system will be deactivated...

code.BTU-005: Low battery: The system will be turned OFF...

DS-001.title: Disk change detected
DS-001.text: Please, check the available disks in the top bar.

DS-040.title: Critical disk space alert
DS-040.text: You are running out of disk space: 20% left.

DS-041.title: Critical disk space alert
DS-041.text: Low disk space: 10% left. The Job will be automatically closed.

DS-042.text: Low disk space: Data capture will be stopped. Time remaining until stopping data capture:

DS-010.title: The disk in use has been removed
DS-010.text: Job data has been lost. Please reconnect the disk to continue working on a new Job.

LCB011.title: Disk space warning
LCB011.text: Generating the selected export files for Job {p1} might cause you to run out of disk space. Do you want to continue anyway?

currentDisk.title: The disk in use has been removed
currentDisk.text: Please reconnect the disk or click 'Redirect' to be redirected to Projects.

SCN-072.title: Scanner temperature increasing
SCN-072.text: Scanner internal temperature is approaching 80°C (176°F) which is above standard use.

SCN-071.title: Scanner temperature warning
SCN-071.text:
Scanner internal temperature is above 80°C (176 °F).
Scanners calibration might be compromised.
It is recommended to proceed with the final alignment.

SCN-070.title: Scanner emergency stop
SCN-070.text:
Scanner internal temperature is above 95°C (203°F).
Scanners might get damaged due to high temperature.
Data acquisition is interrupted.
Proceed to final alignment before deactivating the system.

banner1.text: Scanner temperature is approaching {{temperature}} which is above standard use.

banner2.text: Scanner calibration might be compromised. It is recommended to proceed with the final alignment.

banner3.text: Scanner internal temperature is above {{temperature}}. Scanners might get damaged due to high temperature. Data acquisition is interrupted.

offline.message: You are offline. Please, check the internet connection.

second_antenna.title: Second antenna configuration
second_antenna.subtitle: Pan and zoom the image to centre the target and click "Calculate"

portraitOverlay.rotate: The application is designed to work in landscape mode. Please rotate your device.
portraitOverlay.mobile: The application is designed to work with tablets. Mobile phones are not supported.

job_processing.noRtkAvailable: RTK is missing. Unable to process.

overwrite_alert.title: Export already done
overwrite_alert.text: The Project folder already contains some export files. The files with the same name will be overwritten.

pause_alert.title: Pause processing
pause_alert.text: Pausing processing will cause the loss of other selected Finalise & Export options except anonymisation. Do you want to continue?

importDialog.sameCsysName: A CSYS file with the same imported name has already been imported.
importDialog.importedCsysName: The custom coordinate system imported with that CSYS file is {{name}} and it will be selected.

overwriteDialog.title: A .CSYS file named {{p2}} has already been imported.
overwriteDialog.text: By clicking Proceed the system will load the stored CSYS.

processingDialog.text1: Once this processing round starts, the coordinate system will be locked for every Job in this Project.
processingDialog.text2: The coordinate system can be changed later in Pegasus OFFICE.
